next_state: -= Kitchen =- You are in a kitchen. A standard kind of place. Okay, just remember what you're here to do, and everything will go great. You make out a fridge. I mean, just wow! You can make out an oven. There's something strange about this thing being here, but you don't have time to worry about that now. You can see a table. But the thing hasn't got anything on it. Aw, here you were, all excited for there to be things on it! You hear a noise behind you and spin around, but you can't see anything other than a counter. The counter is vast. On the counter you make out a cookbook and a knife. You shudder, but continue examining the room. Look out! It's a- oh, never mind, it's just a stove. The stove is conventional. But the thing hasn't got anything on it. There is an open frosted-glass door leading south. You don't like doors? Why not try going north, that entranceway is not blocked by one. > -= Kitchen =-0/3
